title: Intelligent Scaffolding-Based Social Studies Simulation Education in Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social studies concepts and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Performing collaborative learning in a smartphone-based VR simulation environment, considering time constraints of working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can express interconnections among core social studies concepts as concept maps through collaborative discussions.
Using an intelligent hint system, learners can self-diagnose and correct errors occurring during discussions.
In a VR simulation environment, learners can divide roles with team members to complete complex social problem-solving scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
